devDependencies.@eslint/js: Core ESLint JavaScript rules and configuration for linting JavaScript/TypeScript code
devDependencies.@types/command-exists: TypeScript type definitions for the `command-exists` package
devDependencies.@types/mocha: TypeScript type definitions for the Mocha testing framework
devDependencies.@types/node: TypeScript type definitions for Node.js APIs
devDependencies.@types/react-dom: TypeScript type definitions for React DOM library
devDependencies.@types/split2: TypeScript type definitions for the `split2` stream splitting package
devDependencies.@types/tmp: TypeScript type definitions for the `tmp` temporary file/directory package
devDependencies.@types/vscode: TypeScript type definitions for the VS Code extension API
devDependencies.@types/vscode-webview: TypeScript type definitions for VS Code webview APIs
devDependencies.@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin: ESLint plugin with TypeScript-specific linting rules
devDependencies.@typescript-eslint/parser: ESLint parser that allows ESLint to understand TypeScript syntax
devDependencies.@vscode/test-cli: CLI tool for running VS Code extension tests
devDependencies.@vscode/test-electron: Test runner for VS Code extensions that runs tests in an Electron environment
devDependencies.@vscode/vsce: Visual Studio Code Extension Manager - tool for packaging and publishing VS Code extensions
devDependencies.css-loader: Webpack loader for processing CSS files and resolving imports/urls
devDependencies.dotenv: Loads environment variables from .env files for development configuration
devDependencies.esbuild-wasm: WebAssembly version of esbuild, an extremely fast JavaScript bundler
devDependencies.eslint: Pluggable JavaScript/TypeScript linter for identifying and fixing code quality issues
devDependencies.eslint-config-prettier: ESLint configuration that disables rules conflicting with Prettier
devDependencies.eslint-plugin-prettier: ESLint plugin that runs Prettier as an ESLint rule
devDependencies.eslint-plugin-tsdoc: ESLint plugin for validating TSDoc comments in TypeScript code
devDependencies.glob: Library for matching files using glob patterns (wildcards)
devDependencies.globals: Provides global variable identifiers for various JavaScript environments
devDependencies.mocha: Feature-rich JavaScript test framework for Node.js and browsers
devDependencies.mocha-junit-reporter: Mocha reporter that outputs test results in JUnit XML format for CI/CD integration
devDependencies.npm-check-updates: Tool for upgrading package.json dependencies to their latest versions
devDependencies.ovsx: CLI tool for publishing extensions to the Open VSX Registry (alternative to VS Code Marketplace)
devDependencies.prettier: Opinionated code formatter that enforces consistent style
devDependencies.style-loader: Webpack loader that injects CSS into the DOM via style tags
devDependencies.ts-mockito: Mocking library for TypeScript that provides type-safe mocks
devDependencies.typescript: TypeScript compiler and language tooling for type-safe JavaScript development
devDependencies.vscode-tmgrammar-test: Testing framework for validating TextMate grammars used in syntax highlighting

dependencies.@vscode/codicons: Icon font and CSS for VS Code's codicon icon set used in UI components
dependencies.@xyflow/react: React-based library for building node-based graphs and diagrams (used for visualization features)
dependencies.command-exists: Utility to check if a command-line program exists on the system
dependencies.elkjs: Graph layout library using Eclipse Layout Kernel for automatic graph arrangement
dependencies.fast-xml-parser: High-performance XML parser for reading and writing XML files (used for GNATcoverage reports)
dependencies.fp-ts: Functional programming library for TypeScript providing type-safe functional constructs
dependencies.process: Polyfill for Node.js process global object for browser environments
dependencies.react: JavaScript library for building user interfaces with component-based architecture
dependencies.react-dom: React package for DOM rendering and manipulation in web environments
dependencies.split2: Stream-based line splitter for efficiently processing line-delimited data
dependencies.tmp: Temporary file and directory creator with automatic cleanup functionality
dependencies.vscode-languageclient: VS Code Language Server Protocol client for communicating with language servers
dependencies.winston: Versatile logging library with multiple transports and formatting options
dependencies.ws: WebSocket client and server implementation for real-time communication
dependencies.yaml: YAML parser and serializer for reading/writing YAML configuration files
